nodes.text: White banthas were a species of large pack animal native to the frozen Outer Rim world of Nelvaan. They had vast amounts of white fur and long black horns.

White banthas were first mentioned in canon by the reference book Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, written by Adam Bray, Kerrie Dougherty, Cole Horton, and Michael Kogge and released on September 4, 2015.
The creatures first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in "Chapter 23" of the Star Wars: Clone Wars animated microseries, which aired on March 22, 2005 on Cartoon Network.
